messages.title: Lambeth's getting better
messages.content: Your local Parliamentary Candidate: the next generation born and bred in the constituency.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Against the Iraq war, for proportional representation and a high pay commission.

mentions.candidate: Chuka Umunna is the only parliamentary candidate standing who grew up, went to school and still lives in the constituency.

leaflet.personalStatement: If the Labour party has an optimistic face, it is his.

politicalExperience.achievements: bringing the community of the housing estates in Streatham together, more youth activities and to bring the tube to Streatham amongst many other things

endorsements.endorsement: If the Labour party has an optimistic face, it is his.

quotes.text: Chuka would be an excellent representative for us and a great role model for our young.
I like the fact that Chuka is the only person standing who grew up here.
I'm excited to have an MP who I can talk to, who will use their community.
Chuka is a breath of fresh air, and is prepared to speak his own mind and depart from the party line.

images.caption: Chuka Umunna image at a local event with a quote from Polly Toynbee.

leaflet.additionalNotes: He is not a career politician, having practiced as a solicitor representing hard working people for over half a decade. Described as 'the next generation of Labour politicians, Chuka Umunna has been called a '21st century politician' by former MP Keith Hill.
